Package sprite

Contains all the abstractions and interfaces for drawing and representing images.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ImgCanvas
    A canvas is what is painted to the screen and generally has control over how things are drawn.
    ImgCommand
    For passing commands to images.
    ImgListener
    Use this with an Animation to see when the animation ends.
    ImgUpload
    The interface for all possible image uploading classes (for different devices).
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Anm
    Implements many methods that only make sense for an animation.
    Img
    This class along with ImgCanvas abstract the view away from the rest of the objects while allowing images to each have an image.
    NullImg
    An empty image that returns nothing for getSlide.
    NullListener
    The default listener for an animation.
    Pause
    The pause command object for pausing an image animation.
    Resume
    The resume command object for resuming an animation.

Package sprite Description

Contains all the abstractions and interfaces for drawing and representing images.
Author:
Brian Nakayama
